channel.title: Deep Learning on Lucas Miranda
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Lucas Miranda

item.title: DeepOF
item.description: A suite for postprocessing time-series extracted from videos of freely moving rodents using DeepLabCut and SLEAP.

item.title: International Conference on Machine Learning 2024
item.description: My impressions, thoughts, and favourite papers on the 2024 edition of ICML, which I attended in person in Vienna.

item.title: Multimodal learning in clinical proteomics
item.description: Predicting antimicrobial resistance in clinical settings could have significant impact for patients. Here, we extend the current state of the art by incorporating antibiotic structural information into our models.

item.title: Neural Information Processing Systems 2023
item.description: My impressions, thoughts, and favourite papers on the 2023 edition of NeurIPS, which I attended in person in New Orleans.
